Reviews.Content: Reasonable but problematic The rooms are very small yet highly functional. In Japan-everything works.Nothing, not one word, of English spoken. 0 and I mean 0.In breakfast room, everyone smokes.Free internet.Polite staff.Near Hatchebore station.No gym but possible to run in the early morning hours in the sois behind the hotel.Recommended BUT take a Japanese dictionary w you.
Reviews.Author: allan1949
